ns2:test-suite.name: Factorial
ns2:test-suite.description: As a user I should able calculate factorial number for given number

step.name: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"
step.title: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"

step.name: Then I take screenshot
step.title: Then I take screenshot

step.name: And I enter "0" into input field having id "number"

step.name: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"
step.title: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"

step.name: Then I should be able to see element having id as "resultDiv" should have text as "The factorial of 0 is: 1"
